author: etan_status
content: yep. you can also subscribe to both events at same time and will receive opt update when there's a new attested_header and a fin update when the finalized_header also changed

author: etan_status
content: EIP to transition consensus data structures to StableContainer as well: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/eip-7688-forward-compatible-consensus-data-structures/19673
